name: Ice and Bears
description:
A simple Game and Watch style game where you play as two polar bears, digging up frozen logs to keep their fire warm.

How To Play

Press left arrow key, A or the left button to control the left bear and right arrow key, D or the right button to control the right bear.

Dig on any side to break snow blocks, dig on a rock-less side to break rock blocks, and dig on both sides to add a log to the fire (digging on only one side WILL toss the log away and not feed your fire).

Keep adding logs to stay warm, as you'll lose if the fire goes out, and go for a high score!

(Mine's 123)
